com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.client

Interface IPreparedOperation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPreparedBooleanQuery, IPreparedGraphQuery, IPreparedQuery, IPreparedSparqlUpdate, IPreparedTupleQuery
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteRepository.QueryOrUpdate

    public interface IPreparedOperation
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getHeader(String name)
      Return the value of the specified HTTP header.
      long getMaxQueryMillis()
      Return the maximum time in milliseconds that the query will be permitted to run.
      UUID getQueryId()
      Return the UUID that will be used to uniquely identify this operation (query, update, etc.).
      boolean isUpdate()
      Return true iff this is a SPARQL UPDATE request (versus a SPARQL query).
      void setAcceptHeader(String value)
      Convenience method to set the Accept header.
      void setHeader(String name, String value)
      Override the value of the specified HTTP header.
      void setMaxQueryMillis(long millis)
      Specify the maximum time in milliseconds that the query will be permitted to run.

    • Method Detail

      • isUpdate

        boolean isUpdate()
        Return true iff this is a SPARQL UPDATE request (versus a SPARQL query).

      • getQueryId

        UUID getQueryId()
        Return the UUID that will be used to uniquely identify this operation (query, update, etc.).

      • setHeader

        void setHeader(String name,
             String value)
        Override the value of the specified HTTP header.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the HTTP header.
        value - The value to be used.

      • setAcceptHeader

        void setAcceptHeader(String value)
        Convenience method to set the Accept header.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to be used.

      • setMaxQueryMillis

        void setMaxQueryMillis(long millis)
        Specify the maximum time in milliseconds that the query will be permitted to run. A negative or zero value indicates an unlimited query time (which is the default).
        Parameters:
        millis - The timeout in milliseconds.
        See Also:
        (Set timeout on remote query)

      • getMaxQueryMillis

        long getMaxQueryMillis()
        Return the maximum time in milliseconds that the query will be permitted to run. A negative or zero value indicates an unlimited query time (which is the default).
        Returns:
        The timeout in milliseceonds.

      • getHeader

        String getHeader(String name)
        Return the value of the specified HTTP header.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the HTTP header.
        Returns:
        The value -or- null if the header is not defined.
